\newenvironment{machine}[1]{
    \begin{tabular}{@{\qquad}l}\textbf{\kern-1em machine}\ #1\\ }{
    \\ \textbf{\kern-1em end} \end{tabular} }
\newcommand{\machineInit}{\\ \textbf{\kern-1em init} \\}
\newcommand{\machineOps}{\\ \textbf{\kern-1em ops} \\}


\begin{document}





\begin{schema}{TClass}
a: \num \\
\where
a =  \negate 1
\end{schema}

    known: \num \\
\where
    known= 1
\end{schema}
